    the color used when drawing the graph

    • Defined in davinci-newton/graph/GraphLine.ts:317

    Sets the color to use when drawing the graph. Applies only to portions of graph memorized after this time.

      the color to use when drawing the graph, a CSS3 color string.

    Returns void

    the index of X variable in the VarsList, or -1 if no X variable is being collected.

Static isDuckType

  • isDuckType(obj: any): boolean
    • Defined in davinci-newton/graph/GraphLine.ts:150

    Returns true if the object is likely a GraphLine. Only works under simple compilation, intended for interactive non-compiled code.

    Parameters

    • obj: any

      the object of interest

    Returns boolean

    true if the object is likely a GraphLine
